resources.string: Select the contacts to get a new photo
The current photo set for the contact
Purring and kneading. Give me a second…

This app may be a little silly, as was intended, but it was written to bring to light our love of cats. My wife and I have four cats (and a dog), and love them very much. I hope this app brings a smile to your face, and encourages you to adopt a cat of your own or donate to a local animal shelter or those foster adoptable animals.

 	Thank you,

 	Casey
